column2: This list contains domains of toxic ActivityPub instances
Being only opt-out and without explicit consent
for a list of instances that are federating with Threads, please see: activitypub.threads.domains.block.list.tsv
Instances maintained by the same people which also use it as a means of directing harrassment.
reactionary bigotry and hatespeech against magrinalized groups
Admin is a known serial harrasser by their own admission:
prevent automatic blocks via imported blocklists of accounts hosted on their site.
Instances that not allow accessing the about page or see any profiles of users, thus preventing any reports and blocks of users.
